description: Describes the common parameters for all network-flows.
title: Network-flow core parameters.

id.description: Globally unique identifier for the network-flow

version.description: String formatted TAI timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating precisely when an attribute of the network-flow last changed

label.description: Freeform string label for the network-flow

tags.description: Key value set of freeform string tags to aid in filtering network-flows. Values should be represented as an array of strings. Can be empty.

source_application_id.description: Application ID which this network-flow originates from.

bandwidth.description: Object containing the details of bandwidth requirements for this network flow (for future extension).

dscp.description: DSCP based QoS metrics number, default is 0, default forwarding.
